quotes.quote: Pumpkins are the only living organisms with triangle eyes.
Like many indelible family memories, carving a pumpkin begins with someone grabbing a really sharp knife.
The mellow sweetness of pumpkin pie off a prison spoon is something you will never forget.
Pumpkin pie is a living symbol of mediocrity. The best pumpkin pie you ever ate wasn't all that much different from the worst pumpkin pie you ever ate.
The pumpkin is a uniquely American plant, widely regarded as one of the most magical plants in all the world.
Once a pumpkin, always a pumpkin.
Pumpkin spice lattes are egg nog for morning people.
The pumpkin itself is a symbol for mortality.
Talking about pumpkins doesn't make them grow.
We fancy men are individuals; so are pumpkins; but every pumpkin in the field goes through every point of pumpkin history.
You could hollow out a big pumpkin and wear it on your head for the entire week of your birthday. This will allow you to get in touch with your Halloween emotions.
Then, once the pumpkin has found its place, it blossoms into a fruit that towers above all others. And when the pumpkin is ripe, it's a veritable life-giving force.
We have a wide variety of pumpkins and a full spectrum of people.
Leaves are falling and the garden is mostly asleep, and the house smells like pumpkin and apple everything.
Someone, I don’t know who, probably a monster, thought it would be a good idea to combine pumpkin spice and pizza, two things that go together like peanut butter and snow tires.
Yes, it’s that special time of year where we voluntarily drink pumpkin spiced lattes, the coffee that tastes like a candle.
The world shall now transform into pumpkin everything.
